help-file.title: SKILL_RANGER
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills and spells available to the Ranger class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h piercing, 1h slashing, awareness, bandage, bash, blindfighting, carve, climb, dodge, double attack, dual wield, first aid, fishing, kick, meditate, mine, mount, parry, quick chant, rescue, retreat, riposte, scribe, shield block, springleap, surprise, swim, switch opponents, track 5th level: ranged weapons 10th level: clerical spell knowledge, sorcerous spell knowledge 46th level: triple attack 56th level: vicious attack
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: Outdoor Sneak
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 3rd circle: Bless, Detect Evil, Magic Missile, Vigorize Light 4th circle: Cure Light, Detect Magic, Protection from Evil 5th circle: Barkskin, Chill Touch, Dispel Evil, Vigorize Serious 6th circle: Concealment, Faerie Fog, Sense Life 7th circle: Infravision, Lightning Bolt 9th circle: Farsee, Haste, Reveal True Name 10th circle: Dazzle, Firestorm, Tree 11th circle: Blur, Mass Barkskin 12th circle: Stone Skin
Ranger Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Blademaster, Huntsman, Marshall
